short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to schedule Panther Meetings and stream your desktop into Panther conferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to enable automatic calendar creation for Google or Outlook calendars and also desktop sharing for Panther Meetings
